description: This file defines express routes related to 'outcomes', including listing, creating, updating, and deleting outcome entities, with associated Swagger documentation and middleware validation.

methods.name: router.get
methods.description: Defines route for listing outcomes associated with a decision, including authentication and validation.

methods.name: router.post
methods.description: Defines route for creating a new outcome for a decision, including authentication and validation.

methods.name: router.put
methods.description: Defines route for updating an existing outcome, including authentication and validation.

methods.name: router.delete
methods.description: Defines route for deleting an outcome, including authentication and validation.

calls: validate({ params: z.object({ decisionId: uuid }), body: outcomeCreateSchema })
validate({ params: z.object({ outcomeId: uuid }), body: outcomeUpdateSchema })
